column5: Any idea where I might be able to obtain a good contour fishing map that is full size and waterproof? Websites etc. Thanks,
Make your own or buy fromCanadamapsales.comFishingmapsplus.comTrakmaps.comAdventurefishingmaps.on.caSent from my SM-A530W using Tapatalk

Depends on which lake...I was just in Sioux Lookout the other day and they have abrahm, minitaki, east sides of Lac Seul maps all waterproof at ojibiway baits, at Bobbies Corner in vermillion bay I'm sure I saw some hotspot maps of eagle (think it was there)... guessing it's like that in each community.Here are some with a quick google search:https://www.fishinghotspots.com/#print/findamap (I have the Eagle Lake version... it's great)https://www.trakmaps.com/en/products...agle-lake-147/
Might help to narrow that down a little. Canada's a pretty big place.
